document.full_text: at least 40 civilians have been killed in air strikes by western forces on tripoli, the top vatican official in the libyan capital said thursday, citing what he called reliable sources in close contact with residents.
document.title: 40 civilians dead in tripoli strikes: vatican official
lines_and_colors: at least 40 civilians have been killed in air strikes by western forces on tripoli, the top vatican official in the libyan capital said thursday, citing what he called reliable sources in close contact with residents.
